headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
